name: WiredAtHome.com
tag_list: audio, video, home-theater, home-networking, electronics, distribution, wholesale
overview:
Wired@Home.com is a leading ecommerce site for the custom installer or DIY’er. Whether it’s Home Theater, Home Networking, Audio, Video or any other project related to home entertainment, we’re plugged in for you!

As a kid growing up, I loved gadgets and electronics in general. I used to take things apart just to see how they worked and always loved the challenge of putting them back together! Today, I still love electronics, especially audio, video & home theater for watching movies, sports and listening to music.

I’ve always been the tech enthusiest that our friends and family would call on for help setting up their new electronic purchase or figuring out what cable went where or even what cables do I need to hook up my new Stereo VCR to my TV for the best sound and picture quality. After realizing that there was a need for an online store that could provide the cables, connectors and other installation accessories along with fast shipping and friendly service, my Wife and I purchased the domain name wiredathome.com in 1998 for $50 and started our new business in our garage. It’s always been our goal to provide the best customer experience possible. Whether you’re a DIY’er like us, a custom installer or even a government agency, we’re always working hard to research & carry the best audio video products with fast, low cost or for many products, free shipping to help you complete your project on time and on budget.

And just in case you’re not 100% satisfied with your purchase, we offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee!

We’ve been blessed to work with many great product manufacturers and distributors over the years who’ve been instrumental of helping us serve our loyal customers. Some of our clients include DIRECTV, AT&T, Verizon, Comcast, Time Warner, Amazon, Google, MIT, FedEx, US Army, US Navy, ABC, CBS and many others.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or feedback on how we can do a better job. Remember, we’re plugged in for you!
